name: Tanks & Planes
description:
Tanks & Planes is a prototype game created for the AirConsole 2020 Game Jam.

From 1 to 6 players, you must cooperate with your friends to defend your city and beat all airplanes that are trying to destroy it.

In order to beat the airplanes and win the war, you must shoot them, and with the help of some power ups that fall around, you will be able to beat the game, is essential that you have someone else to play with.
